question: 焼酎
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Cook</kanji>ed <kanji>sake</kanji> is slightly higher in alcohol content. This is <vocabulary>shochu</vocabulary>, which I'm guessing gets cooked in some way during its production.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>焼</ja> and <ja>酎</ja> are the on'yomi readings, but you didn't learn the reading for <ja>焼</ja> yet. That's okay, because if you know the (also English) word <vocabulary>Shochu</vocabulary>, you'll be able to remember the reading for this one as well too.
